description: This Java class 'HelloController' is a REST controller providing basic endpoints for a Spring Boot application, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info endpoints.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing simple endpoints for greeting, documentation redirect, health status, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message welcoming users to the notesbackend service.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the client to the Swagger UI page, dynamically constructing the URL based on the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' status indicating the application health.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
